name: C-SKINS Hot Wired 3X2 Steamer
description:
Building on the Wireds features such as the Free Floating Engima chest zip, Pre bent knees & Lock Down cuffs, the HotWired features the latest in seam technology - THE POWER SEAM. These advances on the LiquidSeam System use 60% less material but achieve a lighter, more flexible yet still durable seam. The more precise & controlled application of the Power Seam fused with a triple glued seam & the internal use of C-Skins exclusive C-Flex HOTTape creates a ‘Stitchless’ seam which is the lightest, warmest & most flexible seam C-Skins has ever developed.
The HotWired QuickDri Polypro now features Extreme pilling & a more relaxed weave creating an insane amount of flexibility, enhanced thermal properties & a drying time of 15 minutes. The QuickDri Polypro not only covers the chest and back but the entire lower body of the suit, which means you can jump into a dry suit for your afternoon session.

• STITCHLESS
• 100% External Power Seam Power
• 100% Internal C-Flex HOTTaped Seams
• Dura Mesh AirLoc Chest and Back Panels
• QuickDri Polypro chest, back and lower body, 15 minute dry time
• 100% Ultra Stretch C-Flex Neoprene
• Free Floating Enigma Chest Zip
• Lock Down Cuff seals
• DuroFlx Knee pads
• Ultra minimal Seam Styling
• Knee Flex Emboss
• C-Skins New 2012 Future Fit
• Super seal glideskin collar
• External Key Pocket.

name: C-SKINS Wired Series II 4x3 Steamer
description:
This is the suit that Kieren Perrow (Pipeline Master 2011) and Fergal Smith (Notorious Charger) wear! Their input as well as many other team riders through the years has shaped and molded the Wired into C-Skins most successful and recognized wetsuit. For 2013 the Wired features the NEW improved FUTURE Fit by C-Skins; enhancing the suits performance and function through sculpting the wetsuit to achieve optimum fit and comfort, taking into account riders ever diversifying somatotype.

In addition and due to demand several key sizes have been added to the range and now include Extra Small, Small-Tall, Medium-Large-Tall,Extra Large Short and Extra Large- Tall sizes.The Wired 2013 model has uncompromised flexibility and warmth allowing surfers to perform to their optimum ability.This is a suit truly deserved of the Hype!

Features:

• 100% LQS Liquid seam system
• 100% C-FLEX Ultra Stretch neoprene
• Glued and blindstitched construction (GBS)
• FireCore Polypro interior front panel
• Free Floating Enigma chest zip, fitted with genuine YKK zip
• Knee Flex emboss
• Ultra minimal Seam styling
• Lock Down wrist cuffs
• DuroFlx knee pads
• External key pocket
• Super seal glideskin collar
• C-Skins New 2013 Future Fit
